<p><i><b>Lysichiton americanus</b></i>, also called <b>western skunk cabbage</b> (US), <b>yellow skunk cabbage</b> (UK), <b>American skunk-cabbage</b> (Britain and Ireland) or <b>swamp lantern</b>, is a plant found in swamps and wet woods, along streams and in other wet areas of the Pacific Northwest, where it is one of the few native species in the arum family.
